about_the_game:
In-Game Video Production and Licensing:18cmSam
Game Production:Bananaking


◆The Story


The Queen wakes up one day with her eyes open to find herself tied up in a dimly lit captivity chamber with a mysterious hooded man standing before her.

Playing as this mysterious man, you have been given the task by your gang boss to humiliate and temper the captive Queen, with the aim of making her submissive and obedient so that she can serve her boss.

◆Gameplay


The plot has a main storyline that progresses through the conditioning options and dialogue with the Queen.
You can change the angle of the camera to see the conditioning of the dynamic CG of the tuning from different angles.

◆Game Features


◇Game text is over 4800 words
◇One female main character, one male main character, one male secondary character
◇Drama oriented, flirtatious game
◇Game ending: 1 type

Tools for game production：Acgcreator
Tools for creating 3dcg and 3D animation ：Virtamate

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, General Mature Content, bdsm.
All characters are over the age of 20.

name: The Queen's Conditioning in Captivity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: 【The Queen's Conditioning in Captivity】 is a full motion 3D game that tells the story of how a queen, imprisoned in a cellar, is humiliated and conditioned step by step to her ultimate degradation!
